duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce designs for site planning, horizontal layout, and stormwater collection facilities.
Write technical letters and reports such as due diligence packages and calculation books.
Perform field reviews, certifications, and post-design services.
Assist the Project Manager and travel locally to client, consultant, job site, agency, and work locations, as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, related field, or equivalent relevant work experience is required. Professional Engineer Registration (State of Florida) or EI preferred.
